00066 /* Hierarchical Search in the BVH, two methods:
00067  * - for each hit calling a callback
00068  * - gather nodes in an array (easy to multithread) */
00069 
00070 void BLI_pbvh_search_callback(PBVH *bvh,
00071     BLI_pbvh_SearchCallback scb, void *search_data,
00072     BLI_pbvh_HitCallback hcb, void *hit_data);
00073 
00074 void BLI_pbvh_search_gather(PBVH *bvh,
00075     BLI_pbvh_SearchCallback scb, void *search_data,
00076     PBVHNode ***array, int *tot);
00077 
00078 /* Raycast
00079  * the hit callback is called for all leaf nodes intersecting the ray;
00080  * it's up to the callback to find the primitive within the leaves that is
00081  * hit first */
00082 
00083 void BLI_pbvh_raycast(PBVH *bvh, BLI_pbvh_HitOccludedCallback cb, void *data,
00084                       float ray_start[3], float ray_normal[3], int original);
00085 int BLI_pbvh_node_raycast(PBVH *bvh, PBVHNode *node, float (*origco)[3],
00086     float ray_start[3], float ray_normal[3], float *dist);

00155 
00156 /* Vertex Iterator */
00157 
00158 /* this iterator has quite a lot of code, but it's designed to:
00159  * - allow the compiler to eliminate dead code and variables
00160  * - spend most of the time in the relatively simple inner loop */
00161 
00162 /* note: PBVH_ITER_ALL does not skip hidden vertices,
00163  * PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE does */
00164 #define PBVH_ITER_ALL       0
00165 #define PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE    1
00166 
00167 typedef struct PBVHVertexIter {
00168     /* iteration */
00169     int g;
00170     int width;
00171     int height;
00172     int gx;
00173     int gy;
00174     int i;
00175 
00176     /* grid */
00177     struct DMGridData **grids;
00178     struct DMGridData *grid;
00179     BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden, gh;
00180     int *grid_indices;
00181     int totgrid;
00182     int gridsize;
00183 
00184     /* mesh */
00185     struct MVert *mverts;
00186     int totvert;
00187     int *vert_indices;
00188 
00189     /* result: these are all computed in the macro, but we assume
00190      * that compiler optimization's will skip the ones we don't use */
00191     struct MVert *mvert;
00192     float *co;
00193     short *no;
00194     float *fno;
00195 } PBVHVertexIter;
00196 
00197 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00198 #pragma warning (disable:4127) // conditional expression is constant
00199 #endif
00200 
00201 void pbvh_vertex_iter_init(PBVH *bvh, PBVHNode *node,
00202                            PBVHVertexIter *vi, int mode);
00203 
00204 #define BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(bvh, node, vi, mode) \
00205     pbvh_vertex_iter_init(bvh, node, &vi, mode); \
00206     \
00207     for(vi.i=0, vi.g=0; vi.g<vi.totgrid; vi.g++) { \
00208         if(vi.grids) { \
00209             vi.width= vi.gridsize; \
00210             vi.height= vi.gridsize; \
00211             vi.grid= vi.grids[vi.grid_indices[vi.g]]; \
00212             if(mode == PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) \
00213                 vi.gh= vi.grid_hidden[vi.grid_indices[vi.g]];   \
00214         } \
00215         else { \
00216             vi.width= vi.totvert; \
00217             vi.height= 1; \
00218         } \
00219          \
00220         for(vi.gy=0; vi.gy<vi.height; vi.gy++) { \
00221             for(vi.gx=0; vi.gx<vi.width; vi.gx++, vi.i++) { \
00222                 if(vi.grid) { \
00223                     vi.co= vi.grid->co; \
00224                     vi.fno= vi.grid->no; \
00225                     vi.grid++; \
00226                     if(vi.gh) { \
00227                         if(BLI_BITMAP_GET(vi.gh, vi.gy * vi.gridsize + vi.gx)) \
00228                             continue; \
00229                     } \
00230                 } \
00231                 else { \
00232                     vi.mvert= &vi.mverts[vi.vert_indices[vi.gx]]; \
00233                     if(mode == PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE && vi.mvert->flag & ME_HIDE) \
00234                         continue; \
00235                     vi.co= vi.mvert->co; \
00236                     vi.no= vi.mvert->no; \
00237                 } \
00238 
00239 #define BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end \
00240             } \
00241         } \
00242     }
00243

00245 void BLI_pbvh_node_free_proxies(PBVHNode* node);
